detail_desc: Top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in soft jersey.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.

Fitted blouse in a viscose weave with a square neckline front and back, a seam under the bust and smocking at the back. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim over the shoulders and at the hems. Jersey lining at the front.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacket in soft fleece with contrasting colour details, a stand-up collar and mesh-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and zipped front pockets. Unlined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Dress in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a small V-neck opening and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and gathered seams at the waist and below to create width and a tier in the skirt. Unlined.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch slub jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with a roll-edge neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit lambswool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket, contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in jersey with short sleeves, a seam with narrow elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Short dress in an airy weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with narrow ties at the front, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in checked flannel with a collar and chest pocket. Regular fit.
Double-layered hairbands in soft jersey with a sewn-on bow.
Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a draped neckline and open back. Spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Thin metal hoop earrings with a pendant. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Gently flared, long-sleeved dress in jersey with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back, narrow shoulder straps and wide elastication at the hem. Light support.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: Special OCC Mini Me Maddi dres
detail_desc: Lace dress with scalloped cap sleeves, a zip at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Jersey lining.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a wrapover front and concealed press-studs at the sides. Ties at one side and a wide flounced trim around the edges.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and stripes down the sides of the legs.
Loafers with a grosgrain trim around the top, satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a bodysuit, trousers and hat in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with sewn-on ears.
Fitted top in heavily draping ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves. Ribbed trims around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Joggers in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Flared vest top in crêpe viscose jersey with deep armholes.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable, pile-lined hood and zip with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
High-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with back pockets and patch pockets with a decorative zip, a zip fly with a button and skinny legs.
Wide, slightly boxy-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Super push-up bra in lace with decorative, crossover straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Smartphone case in grained imitation leather with a metal decoration at the bottom.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with an appliqué on the front, long raglan sleeves, buttons down one side and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, scalloped foot strap and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués in the shape of a cat’s head with a unicorn horn at the front, and fish scales and a fish tail at the back. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Oversized jumper in a soft cable knit with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Straight hem and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and an opening and ties at the back of the hem.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping viscose jersey. Wide top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Wide, straight-cut bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and a lace trim at the hems.
Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with press-studs and cuffed hems.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Leggings in ribbed jersey with a regular waist. The polyamide content of the leggings is partly recycled. The leggings are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Grained imitation leather backpack with an imitation suede flap, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a handle and drawstring at the top. Unlined. Size 15.5x29x35 cm.
Long-sleeved wrapover blouse in an airy cotton weave with a wide tie at the side.
Fitted, knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a two-part shoulder strap on one shoulder. Jersey lining.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

V-neck top in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front that fastens with a concealed press-stud and ties at one side. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a flounce at the neckline and seam with a wide flounce at the hem.

Short dress in a slightly stretchy weave with a round neck and short sleeves with a small frill trim. Deep opening at the back, narrow ties at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.
Fitted sports vest top in sturdy, ribbed fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.

5-pocket, low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details, a zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Made using Lycra® Beauty technology to retain the shape of the jeans and provide a sculpting effect with optimal comfort.
Lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top and one wide and one narrow shoulder strap.
Ankle socks in a soft, fluffy knit, one pair with a pompom on the front.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short sleeves and a gathered seam at the waist.

Long dress in an airy weave with a round, gathered neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider raglan sleeves, smocking a the waist and a softly draping, gathered skirt. Unlined.
Straight T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Short dungaree dress in denim with adjustable shoulder straps, a chest pocket and side and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and a raw-edge hem.
Trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
